example.eg: Karen has asked Richard to marry her and is hoping for a positive answer.
example.egtrans: 卡伦向理查德求婚了，希望能获得肯定的答复。

example.eg: There were some problems with Ann's behaviour last term, but I'm pleased to say there have been positive changes this term.
example.egtrans: 上学期安在行为方面有些问题，但我很高兴地说，本学期情况有了积极的改变。

example.eg: I'm positive I saw someone run across the garden.
example.egtrans: 我确信刚才看到花园里有人跑过去了。

example.eg: Everyone likes Joe, because he's always so positive. A positive attitude isn't a guarantee of success, but it helps.
example.egtrans: 每个人都喜欢乔，因为他总是非常乐观。积极的态度并不一定就意味着会成功，但对成功有所帮助。

example.eg: Alex's project proposal got a positive reception.
example.egtrans: 亚历克斯的项目提案获得了赞许的回应。

example.eg: You need to get the positive terminal and the negative terminal of the battery the right way round, or the device won't work.
This equation contains positive numbers and negative numbers.
Alan's blood type is A positive.
The company issued a positive denial in respect of the allegations.
The police confirmed a positive sighting of the missing man.
Bill thinks Shakespeare wrote Pride and Prejudice? The man's a positive idiot!
I'm sorry, Mrs Smith, your results are positive; you do have MS.
The economy is showing positive signs of recovery.
Ions can have a positive or a negative charge.
"Good" is a positive adjective.
Positive images are produced from negatives.
"Are you sure you saw someone run across the garden?" "Positive!"
Marilyn is good with money, so that's a positive.
Today we will be learning about positives, comparatives, and superlatives.
Now you have your negatives, you need to develop them into positives.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 艾滋病毒呈阳性的，艾滋病毒阳性的，感染艾滋病毒的

example.eg: There wasn't much to do at our hotel in Greece, but on a positive note, the view was stunning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 还好的是, 值得赞许的是

example.eg: They gave her some positive feedback on her article but didn't publish it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正面反馈, 正面回馈, 好的反应

example.eg: Positive reinforcement works better than punishment with children.
Out of all the patients screened for the virus, only 20% tested positive.
You'll do fine on the test. Keep thinking positive!
